import re

def is_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('\\W+', '', sentence.lower())
    return sentence != sentence[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence.lower())
    return sentence == sentence[::-1]

mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('\\W+', 'MUTATED', sentence.lower())
    return sentence == sentence[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('\\W+', '', sentence.lower())
    return sentence == sentence[::+1]

    return sentence == sentence[::-2]

import re

def is_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('\\W+', '', sentence.lower())
    return sentence == sentence[::--1]
